titles.title: For the relief of Ovidio Javier Morla Paredes, Maria Estrada de Morla, Javier Alfredo Morla Estrada, and Carlos Andres Morla Estrada.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on International Law, Immigration, and Refugees.

bill.summary: 7/13/1993--Introduced. Declares four named individuals eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of being lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
